snippet.title: Here's What Sonam Kapoor Has To Say About Demonetisation

localized.description:
Sonam Kapoor applauded PM Narnendra Modi's currency ban move however the actress added that it wasn't organized well. "The implementation was so disorganized and chaotic. The ideas are lovely but do it in a way which is a little more thoughtful," said the actress. Sonam also shared that she has been giving a lot of auditions in Hollywood.


Watch more videos: http://www.ndtv.com/video?yt
